We Serve Delicious Donuts

At Restaurant afnona, we believe that every day is a good day for donuts. Nestled in the heart of Mushrif, our donut shop is a haven for donut enthusiasts and sweet-tooth seekers alike. Our journey began with a simple passion for creating the most delectable and unique donuts that not only satisfy your cravings but also bring a smile to your face.

About Us

Let me explain our story to you, Our journey began with a simple dream: to create the perfect donut. Founded in 2015, Restaurant afnona started as a small bakery with a big vision. Our founders,Alaa Rafaat and Afnan Rafaat, combined their culinary expertise and passion for sweet delights to bring you an exceptional donut experience :)
